articles.author: Logan Plant
articles.title: European Commission Opens In-Depth Investigation Into the Xbox and Activision Blizzard Deal - IGN
articles.description: The European Commission is putting Microsoft's proposed acquisition of Activision Blizzard under the microscope.
articles.content:
The European Commission is putting Microsoft's proposed acquisition of Activision Blizzard under the microscope.
Announced today, the European Commission has opened an in-depth investigation for the… [+2574 chars]
